messages.message:
Question from NWM today - they're trying to understand how they can see the logs of their custom function as part of a downstream integration in a deployment. Their question specifically:
• Do our run logs cover the downstream integration? 
• If not, what is the best way for the to understand if something fails or errors out through their downstream integration?
cc: @andy @Elan Sharony @jack.robbins

Run logs aren't stored for downstream integrations right now. We have to implement this storage still.

The best way to understand is to use the "Test" functionality against an existing Run
actually, Elan implemented storage a while ago, but we still need the logic to merge this with Flow logs and surface it: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/FLOW-9949
ok got it - cc: @jack.robbins we should prioritize this ticket as part of the end-to-end error handling
yep, updated the requirements to reflect this
